overview: Mia, Haru, and Yuri gathered for the first time in a long time. The reunion, which should be fun, unfolds unexpectedly with the discovery of Mia's pregnancy. With the collapse of the relationship between the three, disturbing noise began to be heard from nearby US military bases.
tagline: A unique work that depicts the collapse of friendship and affection of three women in a surrealistic world view.
title: UFO：未確認の愛
